CustomField.formula: IF( Coordinates_Distance__c >=500, IMAGE('/resource/FI_Ring_Resource/Red_Ring.png', 'Red Ring', 25, 25), IF(AND(Coordinates_Distance__c <500,Coordinates_Distance__c >300), IMAGE('/resource/FI_Ring_Resource/Yellow_Ring.png', 'Yellow Ring', 25, 25), IMAGE('/resource/FI_Ring_Resource/Green_Ring.png', 'Green Ring', 25, 25)) )
CustomField.label: Color Code
